column3: "Focuses on the application of data science to critical problems and opportunities in business."
"Introduction to text analytics with a focus on long-form documents, such as reviews, news articles, and novels. Focus on unsupervised methods."
"A foundation in discrete mathematics, data structures, algorithmic design and implementation, computational complexity, parallel computing, and data integrity."
"Programming essentials for data science: Python, R, GitHub"
"Use Spark for large-scale analytics and machine learning. Basics of AWS cloud tools."
"Build skills to acquire, clean, analyze, understand, and interpret data"
"Examines the ethical issues arising around big data."
"Fundamentals of data mining and machine learning within a common statistical framework"
"Build Bayesian models to provide predictions and quantify the uncertainty in these predictions"
"Teaches visual and spatial thinking coupled with visual data tools and interactive web coding to envision information"
"An introduction to linear statistical models in the context of data science"

column2: "Practice and Application of Data Science Part 2"
